column1: prompt
Suggest a novel product concept and a corresponding value proposition in less than 100 words.

Identify the false statement in the given list of options. A) Bumblebees are able to fly despite their relatively large body size. 
B) The Proboscis monkey has evolved to possess an extraordinarily long nose.
C) The proboscis monkey is the only flying mammal in the world.

Design an algorithm to predict the stock market using the given conditions. A. The dataset includes information related to economic indicators, such as GDP and unemployment rates, as well as company-specific data such as earnings, market capitalization, and financial ratios.
B. The algorithm should be able to predict the market trend over a period of at least one month.

Write a story in less than 100 words using the given characters and setting. Characters: An old man and a young woman 
Setting: Deep in the jungle

Categorize the given sentence as a question or as a statement. What is the meaning of life?

Of vibrant colors on the sea 
In a perfect symmetry

Given the following input, generate a response that naturally follows. I am feeling really down today.
Design a marketing strategy in less than 100 words for the given product. Product: A new low-cost multipurpose printer.

Definition: The process through which plants capture energy from the sun and use it to create their own food.

Generate a poem about nature, include a minimum of 4 lines.

Convert the phrase "Had I known" into past perfect form.

6PM 15°C
8PM 17°C
10PM 16°C
12AM 12°C
2AM 10°C
